abstract: Rio Tinto says it plans to move forward with its $3.9 billion bid for Riversdale Mining, even if a majority of shareholders do not accept the offer.
snippet: Rio Tinto says it plans to move forward with its $3.9 billion bid for Riversdale Mining, even if a majority of shareholders do not accept the offer.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto, one of the largest mining companies in the world, said on Tuesday that it would move forward with its bid for Riversdale Mining of Australia even if a majority of shareholders did not accept the offer.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Cuts Threshold for Riversdale Offer
